Package UserPack.Observer

Class ObserverMiddleVoice

java.lang.Object
UserPack.Observer.ObserverMiddleVoice
All Implemented Interfaces:
VotersFollower
public class ObserverMiddleVoice extends Object implements VotersFollower
Observes voters' activities and reacts accordingly. Pattern: "Observer"

      Parameters:
      evaluationController - The evaluation controller to be added.

    • inform

      public void inform()
      Informs the observer about voters' activities. It calculates the middle voice figures for both restaurants and cafes based on the voting system, and then updates the statistics controller with the calculated figures.
      Specified by:
      inform in interface VotersFollower

    • informForEvl

      public void informForEvl()
      Informs the observer specifically about evaluations. It calculates the middle voice figures for both restaurants and cafes based on the voting system, and then updates the evaluation controller with the calculated figures.
      Specified by:
      informForEvl in interface VotersFollower
